roleset.name: (cause to) go around
roleset.note: CIRCULATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'circulate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. (from circulate.01-v predicate notes)
CIRCULATION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry circulate.01, OntoNotes grouping circulation-n senses 1, 2& 5; no mapping to VN. Framed by Claire. (from circulation.01-n)

example.name: ergative with medium
example.text: Asked whether a $230-a-share figure circulating in the market yesterday is too low, he said, ``It's certainly not too low.''

example.name: agentive
example.text: The plaintiffs also alleged that prior to the fanfare, the company circulated internal memos indicating problems with Lisa.
example.arg: internal memos indicating problems with Lisa

example.name: Arg1 as "of" PP
example.text: The circulation of water was impeded by a pipe blockage.

example.name: Same, new semantic domain
example.text: The dictator tried to stop the circulation of democratic ideals.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Betty Williams, Winner of the Nobel Peace Prize for her circulation of a petition to end violence in Northern Ireland.
example.arg: of a petition to end violence in Northern Ireland.
